items.headline: Barcelona starts foggy, turns mild and dry
items.summary: Current 7.9Â°C (feels 6.5Â°C) with fog/mist at 07:00. Forecast: dry day, high 14.8Â°C, low 7.9Â°C, rain chance 0%.

items.headline: Nvidia unveils Vera Rubin AI system details
items.summary: CNBC's first look says Nvidia's next-gen AI platform (shipping H2 2026) targets a major compute jump beyond Blackwell.

items.headline: NYT tests AI-detection tools at scale
items.summary: A large test of AI-image/video detectors finds they help in some cases but still miss and mislabel content frequently.

items.headline: CISA orders rapid patching for critical Cisco bug
items.summary: US agencies were told to identify exposed SD-WAN systems fast and harden logging/forensics amid urgent vulnerability risk.

items.headline: Researchers disclose Claude Code security flaws
items.summary: The Hacker News reports vulnerabilities that could enable remote code execution and API key theft in some workflows.

items.headline: Argentina Senate approves labor reform after clashes
items.summary: The bill passed 42â€“30 after tense protests near Congress and now moves to the lower house, where changes are still possible.

items.headline: Milei secures 2026 budget approval in Senate
items.summary: Government won backing for the budget, including authority for external debt issuance, despite friction with allied blocs.

items.headline: Spain pushes major migrant regularization plan
items.summary: Government advances extraordinary legalization pathway expected to open residency/work access for many undocumented residents.

items.headline: Spain faces transport and public-service disruption pressure
items.summary: Recent coverage tracks rail disruptions, policy tension, and national political/security debates affecting daily life and business.
